member.name: T:Lextm.SharpSnmpLib.Security.AESPrivacyProvider
member.remarks: This is an experimental port from SNMP#NET project. As AES is not part of SNMP RFC, this class is provided as it is. If you want other AES providers, you can port them from SNMP#NET in a similar manner.

member.name: M:Lextm.SharpSnmpLib.Security.AESPrivacyProvider.#ctor(Lextm.SharpSnmpLib.OctetString,Lextm.SharpSnmpLib.Security.IAuthenticationProvider)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Lextm.SharpSnmpLib.Security.AESPrivacyProvider.EngineId
member.remarks: This is an optional field, and only used by TRAP v2 authentication.

member.name: M:Lextm.SharpSnmpLib.Security.AESPrivacyProvider.Encrypt(System.Byte[],System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Encrypt scoped PDU using DES encryption protocol
member.param: Encryption key. Key has to be at least 32 bytes is length

Privacy parameters out buffer. This field will be filled in with information required to decrypt the information. Output length of this field is 8 bytes and space has to be reserved in the USM header to store this information
member.exception: Thrown when encryption key is null or length of the encryption key is too short.

member.name: M:Lextm.SharpSnmpLib.Security.AESPrivacyProvider.Decrypt(System.Byte[],System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Byte[])
member.param: Decryption key. Key length has to be 32 bytes in length or longer (bytes beyond 32 bytes are ignored).
Privacy parameters extracted from USM header
member.exception: Thrown when encrypted data is null or length == 0
Thrown when encryption key length is less then 32 byte or if privacy parameters argument is null or length other then 8 bytes

member.name: P:Lextm.SharpSnmpLib.Security.AESPrivacyProvider.PrivacyParametersLength
member.summary: Returns the length of privacyParameters USM header field. For AES, field length is 8.

member.name: P:Lextm.SharpSnmpLib.Security.AESPrivacyProvider.MinimumKeyLength
member.summary:
Returns minimum encryption/decryption key length. For DES, returned value is 16.
DES protocol itself requires an 8 byte key. Additional 8 bytes are used for generating the encryption IV. For encryption itself, first 8 bytes of the key are used.

member.name: P:Lextm.SharpSnmpLib.Security.AESPrivacyProvider.MaximumKeyLength
member.summary:
Return maximum encryption/decryption key length. For DES, returned value is 16
DES protocol itself requires an 8 byte key. Additional 8 bytes are used for generating the encryption IV. For encryption itself, first 8 bytes of the key are used.

member.name: M:Lextm.SharpSnmpLib.Security.AESPrivacyProvider.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents this object.

member.name: M:Lextm.SharpSnmpLib.Security.DESPrivacyProvider.#ctor(Lextm.SharpSnmpLib.OctetString,Lextm.SharpSnmpLib.Security.IAuthenticationProvider)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Lextm.SharpSnmpLib.Security.DESPrivacyProvider.EngineId
member.remarks: This is an optional field, and only used by TRAP v2 authentication.

member.name: M:Lextm.SharpSnmpLib.Security.DESPrivacyProvider.Encrypt(System.Byte[],System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: Encrypt scoped PDU using DES encryption protocol
member.param: Encryption key. Key has to be at least 32 bytes is length

Privacy parameters out buffer. This field will be filled in with information required to decrypt the information. Output length of this field is 8 bytes and space has to be reserved in the USM header to store this information
member.exception: Thrown when encryption key is null or length of the encryption key is too short.

member.name: M:Lextm.SharpSnmpLib.Security.DESPrivacyProvider.Decrypt(System.Byte[],System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.param: Decryption key. Key length has to be 32 bytes in length or longer (bytes beyond 32 bytes are ignored).
Privacy parameters extracted from USM header
member.exception: Thrown when encrypted data is null or length == 0
Thrown when encryption key length is less then 32 byte or if privacy parameters argument is null or length other then 8 bytes

member.name: M:Lextm.SharpSnmpLib.Security.DESPrivacyProvider.GetIV(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Byte},System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Byte})
member.summary: Generate IV from the privacy key and salt value returned by GetSalt method.
member.param: Salt value returned by GetSalt method
member.returns: IV value used in the encryption process

member.name: M:Lextm.SharpSnmpLib.Security.DESPrivacyProvider.GetKey(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Extract and return DES encryption key. Privacy password is 16 bytes in length. Only the first 8 bytes are used as DES password. Remaining 8 bytes are used as pre-IV value.

member.name: P:Lextm.SharpSnmpLib.Security.DESPrivacyProvider.PrivacyParametersLength
member.summary: Returns the length of privacyParameters USM header field. For DES, field length is 8.

member.name: P:Lextm.SharpSnmpLib.Security.DESPrivacyProvider.MinimumKeyLength
member.summary:
Returns minimum encryption/decryption key length. For DES, returned value is 16.
DES protocol itself requires an 8 byte key. Additional 8 bytes are used for generating the encryption IV. For encryption itself, first 8 bytes of the key are used.

member.name: P:Lextm.SharpSnmpLib.Security.DESPrivacyProvider.MaximumKeyLength
member.summary:
Return maximum encryption/decryption key length. For DES, returned value is 16.
DES protocol itself requires an 8 byte key. Additional 8 bytes are used for generating the encryption IV. For encryption itself, first 8 bytes of the key are used.
